q1_rating.name: why
q1_rating.value: Teh robot could not seem to coordinate its arm movements to match the coach

q1_rating.name: comments
q1_rating.value: Although the robot was paying close attention, it's arms were uncoordinated.

q2_rating.name: why
q2_rating.value: The robot did not move or show indications of attention. It did not attempt to imitate the movements of the coach as one would expect of someone learning a physical action.

q3_rating.name: why
q3_rating.value: The robot was paying attention but did not attempt tp imitate teh actions as you would expect from a learner.

q3_rating.name: comments
q3_rating.value: It was attentive, but did not imitate.

q4_rating.name: why
q4_rating.value: The robot was attentive and imitated the coaches actions reasonably well. With practice, it could master the actions.

q4_rating.name: comments
q4_rating.value: This was the robot most likely to be successful in learning a sport.
